name: Castle Gauntlet Run
description:
Title: Castle Gauntlet Run

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

This game is a simple platformer. The player must make their way to the castle to stop the evil wizard and destroy the Golden Chalice! Along the way they are constantly under fire from the evil wizard and his minions so buckle up and get ready for some good old fashioned castle crashing!

Instructions:

-Standard WASD Space bar movement scheme

-Camera Angle follows mouse cursor

Objectives: 

Storm the Castle! Dodge the wizard's spells and his minion's chickens and fire the cannons to breach the castle.  Enter the castle and destroy the Golden Chalice once and for all!

Game Design Team

Your Name – Don Cowan
